bibl.title: Studies on the Derveni Papyrus
bibl.note: Includes the Greek text of col. xii.
BRISSON Luc, Chronos in Column XII of the Derveni Papyrus. Translated by Jeffrey REID and revised by Glenn W. MOST.
André LAKS and Glenn W. MOST (Edd.), Studies on the Derveni Papyrus (Oxford, 1997) pp. 149-165.
